comments.en:
Multi-function device which prints, scans, and copies, based on the HP LaserJet 1200. Prints perfectly and scanning support works, too.

Postscript level 2 out of the box, parallel and USB connection, 1220n with ethernet connection.

See a longer user review about the printing capabilities of the device in the entry of the HP LaserJet 1200.

For basic printing functionality use the Postscript PPD. For advanced functionality such as printer status, maintenance features, scanning and photo card unload use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).
